metadata.description: Prospectus for second edition of Sigaud de La Fond's "Élémens de physique théorique et expérimentale", edited by M. Rouland
"4 vol. in-8°. avec figures & le portrait de l'auteur. Prix, 24 livres brochés"--P. [1]
Details the editor's additions and corrections to the second edition
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
